history.content:
Hello all,

I work for the Division of Data Sciences, and I'm pleased to announce that we have some new, exciting leadership opportunities opening up for Spring 2018 with the Division. 

We are currently recruiting for both new members to join our student teams (for academic credit) and a few paid internship positions. These opportunities will allow you to work in-depth with the Division on a range of projects from communication, infrastructure, community engagement, human resources, and research management.

You can find full details about our paid positions at: tinyurl.com/dsinternsspring2018

You can find out more information about our student teams and the kind of work you could participate in at dataconnect.berkeley.edu.

You can apply for any of the positions through our general student teams applications here. Please indicate your preferences in the response field for the question "Is there any other relevant information you wish to disclose?". We are taking applications through 12/31!
tinyurl.com/dsep-sp18-apply

Please direct any and all questions about these opportunities to dsep_recruit@berkeley.edu. This program is not directly affiliated with the EECS or CS departments, so please do not direct questions to their advisors. You can also join our Data Science Support Piazza at piazza.com/berkeley/other/data001.

Thanks, and have a wonderful winter break!
history.subject: Division of Data Science Opportunities
